business.headline: Even Bihar beats Punjab, Andhra, Haryana in fiscal health, shows Niti reportPunjab, Andhra Pradesh, West Bengal, Kerala and Haryana are at the bottom of the Niti Aayog's list on fiscal health. Bihar, an earlier Bimaru state, has managed to outpace its richer counterparts in fiscal discipline. Odisha tops the list among states with the best fiscal management, and is followed by Jharkhand and Chhattisgarh, two surprise states.

Budget 2025: Will Mahila Samman Savings Certificate get an extension?Union Budget 2025: Mahila Samman Savings Certificate has played a key role in encouraging savings among women from the lower-income group and promoting women's empowerment.

What is 'concert economy' that PM Modi mentioned after Coldplay's India showsRock band Coldplay set a new record for the largest stadium concert of the 21st century on January 25-26, drawing over 2 lakh fans in Ahmedabad, surpassing George Strait's Texas record of 1,10,905 attendees.

Sensex, Nifty gain 1% as IT stocks lead market recovery; ITC Hotels fall 4%The S&P BSE Sensex surged 631.55 points to end at 76,532.96, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 205.85 points to close at 23,163.10.

Budget 2025: Does it make sense to have a unified tax slab?Experts urge government to take the best of both the old and new tax regimes and introduce a unified tax regime that would benefit the taxpayers.

Sensex rises over 500 points: What's behind today's bull run on Dalal StreetShare Market Today: The S&P BSE Sensex was trading 508.25 points higher at 76,409.66 at 1:10 pm, while the NSE Nifty50 rose 170.15 points to trade at 23,127.40.

Budget 2025: Will taxpayers get relief? Income tax changes to watch out forBudget 2025: The current income-tax law is complex for average taxpayers due to its technical jargon and numerous provisos, circulars, and notifications.

Budget 2025: Old tax regime vs new tax regime; which is better?Union Budget 2025: The new tax regime was first introduced in Union Budget 2020-21 by inserting a new section, 115BAC, in the Income Tax Act for individuals and Hindu Undivided Families (HUFs).

Bajaj Auto share price rises 5% after Q3 results: Buy, hold or sell?Bajaj Auto stock price: The two-wheeler company's stock rose over 5% to hit a day's high of Rs 8,803.70 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). At around 12:27 pm, shares of the company were trading 3.70% higher at Rs 8,702.90.

Will DeepSeek's low-cost AI models benefit Indian IT firms like TCS, Infosys? Analysts at Motilal Oswal Financial Services suggested that a shift from high-cost AI infrastructure to more affordable alternatives could open new opportunities for Indian IT services firms.

Why is the stock market rising today? 3 things to knowShare Market Today: The Sensex and Nifty50 gained in early trade and experts believe the conditions are favourable for more gains. However, it will depend on key developments, like the US Fed's policy decision and the Union Budget 2025.

ITC Hotels share price: Stock lists at 30% discount on NSE ITC Hotels shares listing: ITC Hotels shares opened at Rs 188 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), listing at a discount of 31% to the discovered price.
Sensex, Nifty open in green as IT and auto stocks rise; Bajaj Auto gains 4%The S&P BSE Sensex added 221 points to 76,122.41, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 66.40 points to 23,023.65 as of 9:35 AM.

Wall Street tech stocks recover a day after DeepSeek selloff hit NvidiaNvidia, which lost 17% in Monday's session, the biggest one-day loss in market history, rose 8.9% on Tuesday as investors looked for buying opportunities.

Former Intel CEO Pat Gelsinger bets on this AI stock amid DeepSeek's riseThe rise of Chinese artificial intelligence (AI) startup DeepSeek caused a huge reaction in the stock market, leading to a $600 billion drop in Nvidia's market value.

Budget 2025: Will 80C and standard deduction be available under new tax regime?Under the old tax regime, a standard deduction of Rs 50,000 is available for the salaried class, while under the new tax regime, the same has been increased to Rs 75,000.
Is linking your credit card with UPI a risky habit? Know hereUPI payments reached Rs 2.34 lakh crore in October 2024, recording a rise of 37% from last year, as per the RBI's latest report.
Boeing reports $11.8 billion in annual loss, largest since 2020Boeing posted an annual loss of $11.83 billion owing to problems at its commercial and defense units, reported Reuters.

ITC Hotels to list on BSE, NSE tomorrow. Check eligibility and other key details Earlier this month, ITC Ltd allotted equity shares of ITC Hotels amounting to Rs 125.11 crore to its shareholders and the latter ceased to be a subsidiary of ITC ltd.

RBI's big liquidity boost: What it means for the economy The RBI has announced OMO purchase auctions of Government of India securities for an aggregate amount of Rs 60,000 crore in three tranches of Rs 20,000 crore each.

entertainment.headline: Watch: New docuseries on Asaram Bapu throws spotlight on India's 'darkest scandal'A new docuseries, Cult of Fear: Asaram Bapu, is currently streaming on Discovery +. The series explores the controversial case surrounding the self-proclaimed Godman.

Actor Gabriel Macht feels sorry for those who go to law school after watching SuitsSuits star Gabriel Macht said he always feels the need to apologise to people who decided to enroll in a law school after watching his hit TV series, Suits.

Sivarapalli review: Rag Mayur's Panchayat remake fails to pass authenticity testReleased-Fri Jan 24, 2025Sivarapalli, the official Telugu remake of the popular series Panchayat, is currently streaming on Prime Video. While the show features strong performances from actors Rag Mayur, Sunny Palle and Muralidhar Goud, it gives a sense of déjà vu throughout.

The Storyteller review: Satyajit Ray's vintage storytelling at its most beautifulReleased-Tue Jan 28, 2025The Storyteller is derived from Satyajit Ray's short story. It features Paresh Rawal and Adil Hussain in the pivotal roles, but it's the stories told in the film and the essence of storytelling that elevate the film.
BB 18's Karan Veer, Chum Darang party with Farah Khan, Aditi-Siddharth and othersKaran Veer Mehra along with Chum Darang were among the other guests at Javed Akhtar's birthday bash.

The Mehta Boys trailer: Boman Irani, Avinash Tiwary explore father-son dynamicsThe first full trailer of The Mehta Boys is here, and it promises a heartfelt and layered story about a father-son relationship. Directed by Irani, the film will premiere on Prime Video in February.

Exclusive: Squid Game star Park Gyu-young wants to play a 'happy virus' in BollywoodSouth Korean star Park Gyu-young opened up about her solitary experience filming Squid Game 2 and her interest in Bollywood roles. She also humorously addressed BTS' V cameo rumours for Season 3.

The Trauma Code review: Ju Ji-hoon's medical show deserves more than just 8 episodesReleased-Fri Jan 24, 2025The Trauma Code Heroes on Call is Netflix's latest K-drama offering. Featuring a stellar starcast led by Ju Ji-hoon, read our review to find out if it is your cup of tea.
Jonas Brothers announce new Christmas film, to release later this yearThe Jonas Brothers have announced a new Christmas film. It is set to premiere on Disney+ Hotstar later this year.

IT Exclusive: Squid Game actor Park Gyu-young on Bollywood, her role, BTS V Park Gyu-young, starring in Squid Game 2 as a North Korean defector, spoke to India Today's Bhavna Agarwal about filming solo, feeling lonely on set, and her interest in Bollywood. She also reacted to the viral BTS' V cameo rumor in Season 3, sparking excitement for the Netflix series.

Exclusive interview with Yim Siwan and Jo Yuri on India Today In an exclusive chat with India Today's Bhavna Agarwal, the Squid Game 2 stars Yim Siwan and Jo Yuri opened up about their roles, life lessons for their characters, thoughts on starring together in a non-toxic drama, and if they would like to star in a Bollywood film together.

Cigarettes After Sex cancels Bengaluru show at the last minute. Here's whyIndie-pop band Cigarettes After Sex cancelled their Bengaluru concert at the last minute, citing local production issues. This left fans agitated, with many expressing their frustration and disappointment.

BookMyShow CEO on Coldplay ticket chaos: First time we tried democratic ticketingAshish Hemrajani, CEO of BookMyShow, addressed the chaos surrounding Coldplay concert tickets in India, explaining that they employed a democratic ticketing system, which required everyone to join a queue and prevented individuals from using their privilege to gain unfair access.

Actor Shilpa Shinde accuses Bigg Boss makers of rigging resultsTV actor Shilpa Shinde called out Bigg Boss makers for deciding the winner themselves, saying the audience has figured out their strategy.

Armaan Malik: Sad that musicians have to keep drilling themselves in people's headsSinger Armaan Malik spoke to India Today Digital about the challenges musicians face to stay relevant in a competitive industry. He also spoke about the evolving concert culture in India and the rise of independent music.

Roadies XX: Prince Narula hits out at Elvish Yadav for teaming up with RheaPrince Narula clashed with Elvish Yadav and Rhea Chakraborty in the latest episode of MTV Roadies: Double Cross after they teamed up to bid for a contestant he wanted.

BookMyShow CEO reacts to PM's push for a 'concert economy' after Coldplay tourColdplay's recent concerts in Navi Mumbai and Ahmedabad have left audiences in awe. India Today spoke with BookMyShow's CEO about the event's success and India's potential as a global concert destination.

Watch: Aryan Khan interacts with team on set of his Netflix series StardomSuperstar Shah Rukh Khan's son Aryan Khan is all set to make his showbiz debut with the Netflix series Stardom, which he will be directing. It will reportedly star Mona Singh in a pivotal role.

Rekha brings elegance to Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin promo as show takes new leapRekha introduces new characters in the promo of Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin's new season, which promises to explore love and sacrifice. The show will premiere on January 30 at 8 pm on Star Plus.

Black Warrant's Kartar-Ujagar Singh and their real-story: Hanged for Rs 500?Vikramaditya Motwane's Black Warrant shows the real-life story of two brothers, Kartar and Ujagar Singh, who were executed for a crime orchestrated by a Delhi doctor. But why were they hanged while the man who hired him walked free? Read on to know.

general news.headline: 30 killed, 60 injured in Maha Kumbh stampede Live Updates30 people were killed and 60 injured after a stampede broke out at the Maha Kumbh Mela in Prayagraj. Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath said the situation was under control and urged devotees not to fall for rumours.
Remarks on Yamuna made in public interest, Arvind Kejriwal tells poll panelRemarks made in public interest, Arvind Kejriwal tells poll panel after notice on 'Yamuna poisoned' remark

Barricades broke, devotees sleeping on ground crushed: Cop on Maha Kumbh stampedeThe Deputy Inspector General, Mahakumbh, said that the barricades placed around the Sangam ghat and the akhadas gave way due to the rush of devotees and pilgrims sleeping on ground were crushed.

Meet coder Luo Fuli, the genius AI gal behind China's sensational DeepSeek R1Many credit the newfound success of China's DeepSeek R1 to its talented team member, Luo Fuli, a 29-year-old "AI prodigy". She was a researcher at Alibaba's DAMO Academy and also started working for DeepSeek when it was a quantitative hedge fund in 2022. Here's the story of the 'genius AI gal'.
Why Indian singles are choosing concerts over coffee datesAs time passes, the way we do everything evolves—including the way we date, a survey is proof!

Gaffe machine Sam Pitroda begins Delhi campaign by welcoming illegal migrantsThe remark will buff up the BJP's narrative of the Congress protecting illegal settlers. Pitroda's history of controversies continues to strain his party's credibility

How Karnataka residents are paying the real price of 'free' in 'freebies'Karnataka Deputy Chief Minister DK Shivakumar while announcing a water tariff hike said the government can't run things for free anymore. The irony? This comes from a government that rode to power on promises of freebies. Now, from water to healthcare, every resident is picking up the tab for those 'free' schemes.

Arvind Kejriwal summoned by Haryana court over 'Yamuna water poisoned' claimA Haryana court has issued summons to former Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal over his claim that the state government was "poisoning" the Yamuna river to disrupt the supply of water to the national capital.

Thought call from Anand Mahindra was prank: Sheetal Devi recalls meetingArmless archer Sheetal Devi, who represented India in the Paris Paralympics, was over the moon after industrialist Anand Mahindra gifted her a Mahindra Scorpio-N. Sheetal dropped a post on her social media to thank the business tycoon for the gift.

Budget 2025: Why government needs to prioritise middle class taxpayersExperts anticipate that a middle class-friendly budget would have a positive impact on the lives of millions of people across the country, by way of increased savings and consumption boost.

GRAP-3 anti-pollution curbs back in Delhi as air quality worsens As Delhi's air quality plunged to 'severe' levels on Wednesday, the Commission for Air Quality Management (CAQM) has decided to reimpose Stage 3 of the Graded Response Action Plan (GRAP) from today.The AQI of Delhi, which was recorded as 276 on January 28, exhibited a sharp increasing trend and was recorded at 365 at 4.00 pm today.

What's Sangam Nose, the Maha Kumbh hotspot that witnessed crowd crushThe Sangam Nose at the confluence of the Ganga, Yamuna, and the mythical Saraswati rivers, draws millions of devotees during the Kumbh Mela. What's the importance of the Sangam Nose, where an overwhelming rush for a dip during Mauni Amavasya in the wee hours of Wednesday led to a stampede, killing 30 pilgrims?

Mauni Amavasya's mystical power: Why it pulls millions to Kumbh MelaThe Kumbh Mela is expected to draw 100 million people on the sacred day of Mauni Amavasya today. The Kumbh, this time, is a once-in-144-years event and Mauni Amavasya has amplified its significance for devotees.

Bihar, an earlier Bimaru state, has managed to outpace its richer counterparts in fiscal discipline. Odisha tops the list among states with the best fiscal management, and is followed by Jharkhand and Chhattisgarh, two surprise states.

Ajay Devgn addresses criticism of Singham Again: Aage dhyaan rakhengeAjay Devgn addresses the criticism of Singham Again and the lack of flair in his character, promising to bring back the energy in future films.

Nayab Saini sips Yamuna water, Arvind Kejriwal claims he spat it back into riverHaryana Chief Minister Nayab Singh Saini on Wednesday took a sip of Yamuna water amid a row over AAP chief Arvind Kejriwal's claim that Haryana was trying to "poison" the river's water. However, Kejriwal accused the Chief Minister of spitting the water back into the river.

Why Gurmeet Ram Rahim is Messenger of God for One Nation, One ElectionOne nation, one parole would be among the biggest advantages of One Nation, One Election. And who would be a better messenger of it than Gurmeet Ram Rahim, who is let out on parole ahead of every election? One Nation, One Election would save time and paperwork spent on the politically-relevant convicts every election cycle.

Gandhinagar housing prices jumped highest in India in 6 years: The growth storyBehind the 120 per cent rise in carpet rate since 2018 is an infra boom, political nurturing and the excitement of potentially hosting the 2036 Summer Olympics

Baaraat stunned upon arrival, told no wedding plannedThe couple, Manu and Rajiv, the neighbours of the groom who acted as middlemen and reportedly took Rs 50,000 to fix the marriage, are now being questioned as the groom and the bride never met, and they only spoke on phone for a week before the wedding.

Out on bail for woman's 2019 murder, man hacks husband, mother-in-law to deathPalakkad Double Murder: A Kerala man out on bail for a 2019 murder was arrested for killing the victim's husband and mother-in-law in Palakkad. Locals blame police inaction, as he had repeatedly threatened the family.

Explained: The controversy surrounding Bad Girl's teaser and its Brahmin portrayalVetri Maaran and Anurag Kashyap-backed Bad Girl, directed by Varsha Bharath, is a coming-of-age drama about a teenager, whose aim in life is to have a boyfriend. The teaser was criticised by a section of people for the portrayal of Brahmins in the film.

Kindness: Why this simple yet powerful word is Children's Word of the Year 2024Kindness was chosen as Oxford's Children's Word of the Year for 2024, surpassing artificial intelligence and conflict, reflecting growing awareness of mental health and global issues.

Student loan forgiveness in US: Biden promised, will Trump fulfil?Former US President Joe Biden ended his term with $183.6 billion worth of student loan forgiveness, but with Donald Trump back in the White House, there are questions about whether he will continue with these initiatives, and about the impact his moves will have on minority borrowers.

Ajay Devgn addresses criticism of Singham Again: Aage dhyaan rakhengeAjay Devgn addresses the criticism of Singham Again and the lack of flair in his character, promising to bring back the energy in future films.

Exclusive: Don't get a lot of films because of how I look, says Neil Nitin MukeshActor Neil Nitin Mukesh spoke to India Today Digital about facing challenges in securing film roles due to his appearance. He also spoke about whether a sequel to Johnny Gaddaar 2 is in the works.

Actor Shanthi Priya defends Bad Girl: Art meant to provoke thoughtActor Shanthi Priya defended the film Bad Girl against criticism from director Mohan G Kshatriyan. She said that the film intends to highlight societal issues rather than target specific communities. She also supported Vetri Maaran and Anurag Kashyap's approach to storytelling.

Rajkummar Rao-Patralekhaa tease new project, clarify 'not becoming parents yet'Bollywood's beloved couple, Rajkummar Rao and Patralekhaa, have teased an upcoming project, sparking excitement. Their cryptic Instagram post hints at a collaboration, leaving fans speculating.

sports.headline: Khawaja explains how he dealt with rough patch: Don't let cricket dictate lifeAfter hitting a stunning hundred in the Galle Test against Sri Lanka, Usman Khawaja explained how he dealt with the rough patch in his cricketing career.

Afghanistan's female cricketers reunite for exhibition match after 3 years in exileAn Afghanistan Women's XI will play a Cricket Without Borders XI in the match at Melbourne's Junction Oval. It will bring together 21 female players who were formerly contracted by the Afghanistan Cricket Board (ACB) before the Taliban regime re-took control in August 2021.

If you're in Delhi, you can watch Virat Kohli's Ranji Trophy return. Here's howFans of Virat Kohli can see their favourite star in action on Thursday, January 30 as he makes his much-awaited Ranji Trophy return. Here's what you need to do to get into the Arun Jaitley stadium in Delhi to watch the star batter in action.

KL Rahul will bat at No. 3 on Ranji Trophy return, confirms Karnataka coachRanji Trophy 2024-25: KL Rahul will return to play Ranji Trophy after a gap of five years when Karnataka take on Haryana in Bengaluru in an Elite Group C contest, starting Thursday.

Smith the best of his generation? Ponting says it's hard to argue against itRicky Ponting feels it is hard to argue against the fact that Steve Smith is the best batter of his generation ahead of the likes of Virat Kohli, Kane Williamson and Joe Root. Smith scored another hundred against Sri Lanka on Thursday, January 29.

Neymar's Santos homecoming: A redemption arc or just a final dance?Neymar's rumoured return to Santos could turn out to be a road to redemption or end up being a quiet farewell for the Brazilian star. With injuries clouding his career and the 2026 World Cup on the horizon, can he prove his doubters wrong?

Kohli's Ranji Trophy return, Delhi vs Railways, Livestreaming: Where to watchVirat Kohli's much-anticipated return to the Ranji Trophy after 12 years has sparked excitement, with the BCCI making a last-minute decision to broadcast the Delhi vs Railways clash, allowing fans to witness the cricketing icon back in domestic action.

After Dorgu signing reports, Luke Shaw returns to training for Manchester UnitedAfter reports of Patrick Dorgu signing with Manchester United emerged, Luke Shaw returned to first-team training for the Red Devils on January 29. Shaw has been out of action since December.

Where will Virat Kohli bat against Railways? Delhi captain Ayush Badoni revealsAyush Badoni has revealed that Virat Kohli will bat at the No.4 spot for Delhi in his Ranji Trophy return match against Railways on Thursday, January 30. Kohli is set to play his first match in the competition since 2012.

Thought call from Anand Mahindra was prank: Sheetal Devi recalls meetingArmless archer Sheetal Devi, who represented India in the Paris Paralympics, was over the moon after industrialist Anand Mahindra gifted her a Mahindra Scorpio-N. Sheetal dropped a post on her social media to thank the business tycoon for the gift.

What happened the last time Virat Kohli played in Ranji Trophy? Ranji Trophy: Star India batter Virat Kohli is all set to make his return to the Ranji Trophy after a long gap of 12 years as Delhi take on Railways from January 30. Here's a look at what happened when Kohli played his last Ranji game in 2012.

WWE legend The Great Khali takes holy dip at Maha Kumbh, mobbed by fansWWE Hall Of Famer and former World Heavyweight champion The Great Khali attended the Maha Kumbh festivities in Prayagraj on Wednesday, January 29. The Great Khali interacted with the fans in Prayagraj.

Pakistan Cricket Board ready for Champions Trophy amid rising concernsDespite mounting concerns, the Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) said that the stadiums in Karachi and Lahore will be ready to host matches in the upcoming Champions Trophy.

SL vs AUS: Ageless Usman Khawaja ends barren run with sublime century in GalleAustralia opener Usman Khawaja bounced back to form by scoring his 16th Test hundred on Day 1 of the first Test against Sri Lanka in Galle. It was his first hundred after a long gap of 19 months.

With consistent performances, he now eyes the top spot held by Australia's Travis Head.

Varun Chakravarthy breaks into top 5 of T20I rankings after 5-wicket haul IND vs ENG: Varun Chakravarthy has jumped 25 places up to No.5 in the latest ICC rankings for T20I bowlers. Chakravarthy has taken 10 wickets in the series so far against England with a five-wicket haul at the Niranjan Shah Stadium in Rajkot.

Watch: Gongadi Trisha hugs, celebrates historic century with proud fatherU19 Women's T20 World Cup: Gongadi Trisha celebrated her century against Scotland on Tuesday with her father, who was cheering her from near the boundary hoardings at the Bayuemas Oval in Kuala Lumpur.

Neymar-Santos reunion confirmed by Brazilian club PresidentSantos president Marcelo Teixeira confirmed Neymar's return after his Al Hilal exit, marking an emotional homecoming for the Brazilian superstar. The 32-year-old forward reportedly accepted a significant pay cut to rejoin his boyhood club, aiming for redemption after an injury-plagued Saudi stint.

England fast bowler Kate Cross ruled out of one-off Ashes Test vs AustraliaEngland fast bowler Kate Cross has been ruled out of the one-off Women's Ashes Test against Australia set to be played from January 30 at the Melbourne Cricket Ground.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.
The generation with answers: Tech-savvy Indian youth tackling global challengesIndia's tech-savvy youth rewriting the global narrative, one solution at a time.

Left sweeps JNU students' polls, Dhananjay is first Dalit presidentThe Left swept the Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls, winning all four posts and trouncing the RSS-affiliated ABVP. The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
Jawaharlal Nehru University: Brains trustTeaching and research go hand in hand at the institute which is proud of its activist tradition.
